ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic

Interface ConditionalStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConditionalInstructionStep, ConditionalQuestionStep

    public interface ConditionalStep
    This Interface defines the methods used for ConditionalSteps which can be added to ConditionalOrderedTasks and are only shown to the user when certain conditions are met. The logic is derived from the FHIR Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemEnableWhenComponent element. ResultRequirements can be added to the step and will be verified every time before displaying the step to the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRequirement(ResultRequirement req)
      Adds a ResultRequirement which has to be met in order for the ConditionalStep to be displayed to the user.
      void addRequirements(java.util.List<ResultRequirement> reqs)
      Adds a List of ResultRequirements which have to be met in order for the ConditionalStep to be displayed to the user.
      boolean requirementsAreSatisfiedBy(org.researchstack.backbone.result.TaskResult result)
      Checks if all the ResultRequirements of a ConditionalStep are met by the answers given by the user up to the point of the check.
